name: nextexplorer
description: nextExplorer is a self-hosted web file manager built to work within the Next.js ecosystem. It offers basic file operations, folder navigation, and an interface styled after modern file explorers.
features: File browsing: Navigate through directories with folder tree and breadcrumb navigation.
File operations: Upload, download, rename, move, and delete files through web interface.
Preview support: View images, videos, and documents without downloading.
Search functionality: Find files and folders by name across the entire file system.
Drag and drop: Upload files by dragging them into the browser window.
Bulk operations: Select multiple files for batch actions like move or delete.
Responsive design: Modern interface adapts to desktop, tablet, and mobile screens.
Keyboard shortcuts: Navigate and manage files efficiently with hotkeys.
File sharing: Generate shareable links for files and folders with access controls.
Sorting options: Order files by name, size, date, or type for easier organization.
Grid and list views: Switch between different layout modes for file display.
Next.js powered: Built on modern web framework for fast performance and SEO.
